item.title: Annie add a quote by Elizabeth McCracken
item.description: "Grief lasts longer than sympathy, which is one of the tragedies of the grieving." -- Elizabeth McCracken

item.title: Annie add a quote by Edith Bouvier Beale
item.description: "I tell you if there's anything worse than dealing with a staunch woman... S-T-A-U-N-C-H. There's nothing worse, I'm telling you. They don't weaken, no matter what." -- Edith Bouvier Beale

item.title: Annie add a quote by Edith Bouvier Beale
item.description: "I'm pulverized by this latest thing!" -- Edith Bouvier Beale

item.title: Annie add a quote by Edith Bouvier Beale
item.description: "This is the best thing to wear for today, you understand. Because I don't like women in skirts and the best thing is to wear pantyhose or some pants under a short skirt, I think. Then you have the pants under the skirt and then you can pull the stockings up over the pants underneath the skirt. And you can always take off the skirt and use it as a cape. So I think this is the best costume for today." -- Edith Bouvier Beale
